mdRecord.dcterms:title: A map of Albemarle County, Virginia / From original surveys by G. Peyton, C.E.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Peyton, Green, d. 1897 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Includes illustrations of Monticello and of the Rotunda, a "Table of distances," and statistics. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G3883 .A3 1875 .P4: Copy 1: Handcolored highlights in pink and green. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G3883 .A3 1875 .P4: Copy 2: "Donated by F.P. Dunnington, 1908." [original]

SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G3883 .A3 1875 .P4b: A variant, without the table of distances or the statistics. Enhanced with hand drawn and colored drawings of trees, farm animals and other vignettes. Colored images of Farmington and Bloomfield are pasted outside the border of the map. Mounted on a board; in a green wooden frame, 57 x 51 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Albemarle County (Va.)--Maps
